Comments

If you have not read the documentation, do so! I have little sympathy for those who wont RTFM.


Not all functionality in the parent library is made available in ParamBSpline2. cmd. For those interested read the comments in subroutines mnparc and parcuv of ParamBSpline2. Nor have I implemented all of the FITPACK library. For those interested in REXX implementations of the remaider of this library I have a publically available utility which aids translation of FORTRAN to REXX.

Any error messages will be printed to the shell. For those technically inclined this is known as "standard out". Therefore it can be readily redirected as desired. All other output goes to the file specified in the InputFile.


If used as a subroutine ParamBSpline2 returns a 0 for any error condition and a 1 if termination is normal.
